mapper.select: SELECT ctgy_id, ctgy_name, ctgy_parent, ctgy_group, level FROM category WHERE ctgy_kind = 301 START WITH ctgy_parent is null CONNECT BY PRIOR ctgy_id = ctgy_parent

SELECT * FROM CATEGORY WHERE 1=1
AND CTGY_PARENT IS NULL
AND CTGY_PARENT IS NOT NULL
AND CTGY_KIND = #{ctgy_kind}
SELECT * FROM CATEGORY WHERE CTGY_GROUP = (SELECT CTGY_GROUP FROM CATEGORY WHERE CTGY_NAME = #{ctgy_name}) AND CTGY_PARENT IS NOT NULL

select tb2.mem_id, tb2.mem_kind, tb2.MEM_NAME , tb2.MEM_TEL , tb2.MEM_ZIP , tb2.MEM_ADD , tb2.MEM_ADDR , tb2.MEM_CVS_NAME, tb2.MEM_CVS_TEL , tb2.MEM_INTRO , tb2.MEM_X , tb2.MEM_Y FROM (SELECT tb.*, ROWNUM rn FROM (SELECT M.MEM_ID , M.MEM_KIND , M.MEM_NAME , M.MEM_TEL , M.MEM_ZIP , M.MEM_ADD , M.MEM_ADDR , M.MEM_CVS_NAME, M.MEM_CVS_TEL , M.MEM_INTRO , M.MEM_X , M.MEM_Y FROM MEMBER M WHERE M.MEM_ID IN ( SELECT T.PLACE_ID FROM ( SELECT PLACE_ID , LISTAGG(CTGY_ID, ', ') within group (order by CTGY_ID) CTGY_ID FROM CVS_SERVICE GROUP BY PLACE_ID )T WHERE T.CTGY_ID = #{ctgy_id} ) AND M.MEM_CVS_NAME LIKE '%'||#{mem_cvs_name}||'%') tb)tb2 WHERE tb2.rn BETWEEN (#{page}-1)*#{pageSize}+1 AND #{page}*#{pageSize}
mapper.update: UPDATE category SET ctgy_name=#{ctgy_name}, ctgy_info=#{ctgy_info}, ctgy_kind=#{ctgy_kind}, ctgy_group=#{ctgy_group}, ctgy_parent=#{ctgy_parent} WHERE ctgy_id=#{ctgy_id}
mapper.select: select ctgy_id, ctgy_name, ctgy_parent, ctgy_group from category where ctgy_group =#{ctgy_group} and ctgy_parent is not null and ctgy_kind ='301'
